title: Losing LP due to early disconnects or AFK's (Remake unavailable Bug)
body:
I'm trying to get my account back to silver again after bad placements, but all riot can do is giving me teams where a player goes afk or disconnects in the first minutes,

the worst part is i can't Remake while there has never been an first blood? is this a bug or so?
riot said if someone disconnects in the first few minutes of the game we can remake.
this has happened twice already and lost 34lp so far

replies.body:
A Remake only becomes available if a player has been marked *inactive* for 90+ seconds within the first 3 minutes of the match. If they weren't inactive long enough or if they disconnected later in the match, this would make the match *ineligible* for a remake. 

Check out our [/Remake FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) for more details, let me know if you have any questions.
